resources.string: Princess Diana of Themyscira is an Amazon warrior princess and one of the world\s first superheroes, known as Wonder Woman.

Clark Joseph Kent, born with the Kryptonian name Kal-El, is an incredibly powerful alien superhero of the House of El, one of the extremely few survivors of the destruction of Krypton, and an investigative reporter of the Daily Planet.
Bruce Wayne is the billionaire owner and CEO of Wayne Enterprises and the costumed vigilante operating in Gotham City known as the Batman.
